description:
Ergonomic, smooth and simple, this auto-blocking device is cunningly engineered. Deep ribbed grooves let you use it with a wide range of ropes: skinny alpine floss to fat top-roping cords. Use it in autoblock mode to belay 2 following climbers. The release slot allows it to be released easily while under load. Ideal for guides, alpine climbing and multi-pitch rock routes.

  • Grooved slots provide efficient braking and smooth handling
  • Auto-blocking mode allows simul-belaying of 2 seconds from above
  • Release slot is large enough to fit a carabiner to release it under load
  • Recommended for use with 7.7 to 11mm diameter ropes
name: Wild Country Pro Guide Lite Belay Device
